text: sabqu -ayha alnas- fi alsaey 'iilaa 'asbab almaghfirat min altawbat alnswh walabtead ean almeasy; litujzawa maghfirat min rabikum wajanat earduha kaeard alsama' walard, wahi mueaddat liladhin whhadu allah wattabaeu rslh, dhlk fadal allah aladhi yutih man yasha' min khlqh, faljnt la tunal 'iilaa birahmat allah wfdlh, waleamal alsalh. wallah dhu alfadl aleazim ealaa eibadih almwmnyn
